review: Totally happy with dictor,s approch n satisfied with treatment . Aksi th atmispgere of hospital n staff.

Dr.Sandeep Prasad is very experienced and an amazing doctor.Really enthusiastic and knowledgeable doctor.Very passionate doctor. Nice to hear that he returned from UK after serving there for almost 20 years.The doctor was really quick to respond in the case of an emergency. T** **** ****** * **** **** *** **** ****He's very friendly and very supportive. **** ****** ** ******* ** *** *** ****** *** ********** ********.Suggested only required tests and medicines. Thanks sir for everything.

I am so glad that we went to him for our daughter treatment. The best part the moment he saw the place he said confidently that it is pulled elbow and then x-ray happens and same thing came. What as a patient we like about our doctor is the confidence and care. We got both and we loved our experience here in Health Valley. Thank you so much Doctor.
For small suggestions he charges ₹700 which is too much. Says everything’s fine and send away the patient charging the consultation time every time we visit

I had been to hospital and it was for back pain* ********* *** **** ** ******. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was friendly.

I had leg pain related so went to hospital. ************ *** **** **** ** *** ******. Initially patient was myself and later it was my family members. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Earlier I met him in different hospital, through practo I got to know about him. There was no waiting time when we went. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done. Actually 20 years back I met with accident and had multiple fractures on thigh bone, I was getting pain and unable to walk. Doctor told it was related to weather change and pain would be there. When I get stressed or if weather is too cold or hot, I face difficulty in walking. Doctor was friendly. Hospitality was good and neat. Treatment went well.

I had a fender-bender on a motorbike and hurt my knee. Consulted doctor on my knee injury as I wasn't able to fold my leg 12 hours post my accident. Doctor prescribed an x-ray and mri to get a detailed report & catch the miniature ligament  displacement & bone fracture. Doctor clearly eplained the injury while walking through the reports, care & timeline to heal the injury. I am satisfied with care in the hospital and the doctor's kind & friendly approach in treating the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Sir was able explain the condition I am facing extremely well, he cleared all my doubts and gave me the guidance I required. He didn't rush the explanation and was calm in explaining which made it easier for me to understand. Showing photos of my conditions helped understanding my condition even better. I would recommend the place and doctor to everyone without a second thought.
